entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 12:51 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain at times mixed with snow near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
